On the other hand, some software cannot be made portable with VMware ThinApp, some examples to date (June, 2008), are:
On the other hand, some software cannot be made portable with VMware ThinApp, some examples to date (June, 2008), are:
*Any software that requires [[device driver]]s to function properly (like [[Daemon tools]])
*Any software that requires [[device driver]]s to function properly (like [[Daemon tools]])
  +
*Software with [[Copy protection]] based on [[Hardware]]
*Most Security Software{{Fact}}
*Most Security Software{{Fact}}
*Software already bundled with [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] and not available as a separated package (like [[Windows Picture and Fax Viewer]])
*Software already bundled with [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] and not available as a separated package (like [[Windows Picture and Fax Viewer]])
